column2: # Identify the lines what were used in the different experimental rounds and the number of rats used per round and line
rounds <- d %>% group_by(line_f, round_f) %>% summarise(n=n()) %>% reshape2::dcast(line_f ~ round_f)
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'line_f'. You can override using the `.groups` argument.
Using n as value column: use value.var to override.
# Only Control and WT were used in different rounds
